Aux:TextAnnotations.Aux:document_text: 03 }D om PAYROLL CARD SERVICE AGREEMENT This Agreement between First Tennessee Bank National Association (“Bank”), and East Tennessee State University (“Employer”) is entered this date of Fek. 3.6>^ 2010 (“Effective Date”). Employer wishes to promote payroll card account services to its employees (“Employees”) in order to improve Employees’ participation in the payroll direct deposit program, and to enable Employees without bank accounts to obtain them. Bank wishes to provide such services and accounts. Accordingly, Employer and Bank agree follows. 1. Bank Requirements. Bank will: a. Provide Payroll Card applications (including direct deposit authorizations) and brochures to Employer at Bank’s expense, for distribution to existing Employees not utilizing direct deposit, and to new Employees as part of Employer’s hiring or new employee orientation process. b. Assist Employer as appropriate in promoting and explaining Payroll Card services. c. Review applications and supporting documentation for Payroll Card accounts, approving all applications except those from individuals with criminal or credit reporting agency records containing reports of theft, fraud or similar misconduct, and those which contain false or misleading information, or do not meet the customer identification and verification requirements of the USA Patriot Act. d. Provide Employees with a welcome kit explaining how to use their new card and also provide a contact number for live agent customer service. e. Provide turn-key Payroll Card services to Employees, to include card issuance, replacement, balance inquiry, change of address, and all other card service related requests. f. Provide outstanding quality customer service to Employees. g. Provide Employer with a file of Payroll Card account information (participant file) for its Employees. Information will include routing transit number and bank account number necessary for direct deposit. 2. Employer Requirements. Employer will: a. Provide a copy of the Payroll Card application, brochure and related materials to new Employees at hiring or orientation, and to all present Employees without existing payroll direct deposit. b. Verify Employee identity information upon receipt of the completed Employee Payroll Card application or (if applications are direct mailed by the Employee to the bank) upon receipt of participant file from Bank. Employer also agrees to provide subsequent verification on request if required by the USA Patriot Act. c. Pay Employees with Payroll Card accounts by direct deposit, following receipt from Bank of the direct deposit participant file. Fees. There is no charge to Employer for providing Payroll Card services. If charges are assessed to the Employer (East Tennessee State University), First Tennessee Bank will notify the Employer of these changes. Our only Payroll Card account fees to Employees are $1.50 for ATM withdrawals (free at all First Tennessee ATMs) and a $17.50 fee should an overdraft occur. (Fees to the employee are subject to change.) We do not charge a lost card fee, card issuance fee, customer service fee (for calls received), POS purchase fee, POS cashback fee (cash back is free and available at over a million locations nationwide), or a monthly maintenance fee. After 12 months of no account activity, we charge a $5 monthly dormant account charge. 4. Term. The term of this Agreement is until 12/31/2013. Either party may terminate this Agreement on thirty days advance written notice. Nevertheless, termination of this Agreement shall not, in and of itself, terminate existing Payroll Card accounts for Employees, or Employer’s direct deposits to such accounts. 5. Notice. Applications, files, notices, and other communications between the parties to this Agreement shall be to the contact persons identified below for each party or to such person as a party may later designate by written notice to the other. First Tennessee Bank National Association Contact Name: Business Service Center Address: 1555 Lynnfield, Bldg C Memphis, TN 38119 Phone: 1-888-382-4968 E-mail: BusinessServiceCenter@ftb.com Employer: East Tennessee State UHiiiversity Contact Name BJ King________________ Address:_____PO Box 70732____________ Johnson Ci ty,-TN—37614 Phone: 423-439-4414____________ E-mail: ______kingb.1@etsu. edu__________ Employer: East Tennessee State University Contact Name: Tairrny Hamm Contact Name: Tairrny Hamm Address: PO Box 70564 Johnson City, TN 37614 Phone;• 423-439-5394 E-Mail: hammt@etsu.edu 6. Authorization. The persons signing below are authorized to enter into this Agreement by their respective parties.
